template1.title: Vendor Creation email to Admin (Approval Off)
template1.email_body:
Dear Admin,

A new vendor {info.vendor_title} has registered on the site by {vendorer.name}.
Click here to see all the vendors.

This is system generated email, please do not reply. Many thanks from {info.sitename}

replacement_tags.name: info.allVendors
replacement_tags.description: Link to all vender view. (Admin user only)

template2.title: Your vendor registration at "{info.sitename}" is complete
template2.email_body:
Dear {vendorer.name},

Thank you for registering as a vendor, {info.vendor_title} is now published at {info.sitename}. You can edit your vendor information here.

This is system generated email, please do not reply. Many thanks from {info.sitename}
template2.email_subject: Your vendor registration at "{info.sitename}" is complete

replacement_tags.name: info.allVendors
replacement_tags.description: Link to all vender view. (Admin user only)

template3.title: Vendor Creation email to Admin (approval On)
template3.email_body:
Dear Admin,

A new vendor named {info.vendor_title} has registered on the site by {vendorer.name}. Click here to see all the vendors.
Note that you need to approve this vendor before they go live on the site.

This is system generated email, please do not reply. Many thanks from {info.sitename}.

replacement_tags.name: info.allVendors
replacement_tags.description: Link to all vender view. (Admin user only)

template4.title: Vendor Creation email to Vendor Owner (approval On)
template4.email_body:
Dear {vendorer.name},

You have created a new vendor {info.vendor_title}. Your vendor profile is under going approval process. Once your administrator approves you can proceed further.
Please wait for approval email.

This is system generated email, please do not reply. Many thanks from {info.sitename}
template4.email_subject: Your vendor registration for "{info.vendor_title}" at {info.sitename} is pending for approval

replacement_tags.name: info.allVendors
replacement_tags.description: Link to all vender view. (Admin user only)

template5.title: Admin approves Vendor (approval On)
template5.email_body:
Dear {vendor_user.name},

Your vendor profile {vendor_data.vendor_title} has been approved by admin. Now you can further continue.

This is system generated email, please do not reply. Many thanks from {info.sitename}
template5.email_subject: Your vendor registration for "{vendor_data.vendor_title}" at {info.sitename} has been approved!

template6.title: Edit Vendor profile mail to admin
template6.email_body:
Dear Admin,

The user {vendorer.name} has made changes to vendor {info.vendor_title}.

Vendor details are -
Vendor title - {info.vendor_title}
User - {vendorer.name}
Client - {info.vendor_client}

This is system generated email, please do not reply. Many thanks from {info.sitename}
